bit.name: NW_ClimbOnSnowHorn
bit.description: climbing onto SnowHorn (will warp you to nearby one)

hint.phrase: Find the source of those dinosaur calls. It sounds like the Queen is in distress. I'm sure that new upgrade you collected will be useful somewhere. Look out for the same symbol that you targeted in the Magic Cave.
Hi, Fox. Those horrible SharpClaw treat the SnowHorn real bad! If you find one in distress, be sure to help it out.
One of the SnowHorn has been shackled on her leg, so you need to find a key. Have you and Tricky searched inside the underground huts? I'm sure the SharpClaw are keeping warm down there...
Fox, the girl mentioned something called a Magic Cave. Maybe there's one in this area. And remember, she said that the Staff would react in a strange way if the cave was close by.
Hurry, the Queen flew inside the fortress. Can't open the gate? Guess it's time for a swim, Fox!

All the clues are around to find where the Queen is being kept (you've seen Life-Force Doors before). When you get there, look beneath her for a weak stone and use some explosive power to break her free. Search around for Staff Lever switches...
The SharpClaw have hidden the Power Crystals around the courtyard. Check that raised middle section. Maybe there's something on there that will show where the Power Crystals are placed.

bit.name: IM_RescuedTricky
bit.description: set at start of bike scene

hint.phrase: Looks like Prince Tricky is in big trouble, but there doesn't seem to be a way to get into that prison. Though my sensors are showing that there are some SharpClaw near to that cannon. Maybe you and your Staff can discuss releasing Tricky with them!?

bit.name: IM_RaceStarted
bit.description: set when the race actually starts

bit.name: ITEM_Staff_Got
bit.description: clearing on Galleon restarts ship battle

bit.name: SH_WarpStonePathOpen
bit.description: did blow up wall leading to WarpStone

bit.name: WM_SwitchRelatedA7
bit.description: related to KP pressure switch door; toggled repeatedly during Krystal getting captured scene

bit.name: SH_ReturnedToQueen
bit.description: Talked to queen after bringing Tricky back from Ice Mountain

hint.phrase: I'm sure Tricky was very excited about seeing his mother again. Maybe that's where he's run off to?

bit.name: SH_Entered00C0
bit.description: also toggled when leaving queen cave, and in CRFort

hint.phrase: C'mon, Fox! You can't be taking much notice of what's around you! It's very easy. Just open the portcullis with your Staff!

bit.name: IM_OnBike
bit.description: set when you can actually steer but also during the cutscene of "rescuing" Tricky

hint.phrase: C'mon, Fox! Tricky needs help. Stop those SharpClaw that are chasing him!

bit.name: ITEM_SpiritTestFear_Got
bit.description: have the Krazoa Spirit from Test of Fear (and haven't released it)

hint.phrase: Do not allow your fear to take you over the edge, or else Scales will win. Control your fear by remaining calm and centering your spirit.
You need to herd the Frost Weeds to the GateKeeper's Trunk. Try using Tricky's Find Command to do that for you while you take care of the SharpClaw!

So you're gonna help the Krazoa, are you, Fox? There's something not quite right, but that girl sounds in real trouble! First you need to defeat that bad guy! Take a look around and keep a close eye on your Staff. The Magic Cave is on Moon Mountain Pass somewhere...
The Galdon has eaten the SpellStone, so you need to find a way inside him! His weak points are highlighted, so give them a few hits and see what happens!

bit.name: WM_EnteredKrazoaTest1_0129
bit.description: set when entering Krazoa test 1, cleared when talking to spirit

bit.name: HintTexts0
bit.description: related to hint texts; flags, set when Krystal boards ship

hint.phrase: It's dark in the underground caves, Fox. Maybe there's a Lantern in the Store?

Fox, be quick! The ThornTail cannot defend themselves against those Bloops! Use your Fire Blaster and get them all within the time limit. Make sure you search all over the level, as sensors are showing that a ThornTail is not within the main area...

bit.name: SH_FirstMagicCaveFound
bit.description: whether entrance is active (glowing, can enter)

bit.name: WM_Spirit1Related_0143
bit.description: set when collecting first spirit; cleared when it enters krazoa head

bit.name: CC_UsedCannon
bit.description: Used cannon to open route to Ocean Force Point

hint.phrase: The SharpClaw have blocked the route to the Ocean Force Point. My sensors have indicated there is a cannon in the vicinity that could be used to remove this block?

There's lots going on so I'll keep it brief. The LightFoot on the beach has something you need. The SharpClaw Disguise will be of great use. Search the water-filled caves and don't forget about Tricky!
There's no Spirit, Fox? I don't know what to say. Maybe try standing where it would have been?

bit.name: IM_SnowRelated0188
bit.description: set when you enter the trigger that starts the snow

hint.phrase: Hi, Fox. I'll be here to help you if you ever get stuck, and I guess if you're talking to me, you must be stuck already! You need to find a weapon of some sort. Look out for something sticking out of the ground.
The beacons won't burn by themselves. What were the ThornTails saying about the Fire Weeds? And I'm sure that Tricky's hot fire breath will become useful at some point...

You've got to move fast, Fox! Get back to ThornTail Hollow and find the Queen EarthWalker. She must know more about what's going on. And if you haven't got them already, I think you might need the Hi-Def Display Device!
Now that you've got that big Scarab Bag, you need to fill it with Scarabs! You should be able to buy something shiny and golden from the store.
Can you remember that Blue SnowHorn back at SnowHorn Wastes? I recall he was very sad. You should give him a nice gift to cheer him up!

bit.name: SH_WarpStoneRelated01A8
bit.description: toggled when talking to WarpStone, and in CRFort

hint.phrase: The gas that those plants produce is highly explosive. Try planting their Spores in other areas and see what damage you can do.

bit.name: MagicCaveExitWarp
bit.description: WARPTAB index that magic cave will exit to

bit.name: IM_TrickyRelated01B9
bit.description: set when starting Tricky landing scene

bit.name: IM_TriggerSlippy
bit.description: Set to trigger Slippy's "water is cold" warning if not already seen

hint.phrase: Go and flick that switch and see where it leads. Maybe that will allow you to get that CloudRunner free, whoever she is...
That big HighTop Dinosaur looks a bit upset. Have you tried talking to him? And the scanners are showing markings on the beach. Why don't you use Tricky to check them out?

bit.name: IM_TrickyRelated01D6
bit.description: set when starting Tricky landing scene, cleared after race

bit.name: ITEM_DeletedSpell1D7
bit.description: in spell bits table but does nothing

hint.phrase: Search around in the platforms above for a lever, though you'll need some explosive power as it's hidden behind a wall. And I'm sure that the cannon at the top will come in use for target practice. The Galdon must be close by. My life force sensor has gone off the scale!

The machine that you went past when going up to the cannon is not going to work in that condition. It's missing some cogs. Maybe by using the cannon, you can uncover three cogs to get it up and running again.

bit.name: IM_TrickyRelated01ED
bit.description: set when warping to Ice Mountain, cleared when starting Tricky landing scene

hint.phrase: Hiya, Fox! You're not looking hard enough. Try looking up! Though when you get to the next area, my sensors are showing that there's a path over that big drop but I just can't see it! What are ya gonna do, Fox?

There must be somewhere you can use the Dinosaur Horn? I'm sure that when you and Tricky collected a cog from that area where it was very misty, that I saw a marking on the ground? If you get someone to help you, then take a lift to the entrance of the underground mine...

You need to make your way to the top of the palace. There are some dark areas that will need FireFlies, so make sure you're stocked up. And be careful. I'm sure General Scales has this place under heavy guard.

bit.name: WM_SpiritHead1Fired
bit.description: when releasing spirit 1, head fired laser

hint.phrase: How are you doing, Fox? Seems that Belina Te and Tricky are nearby, but you need two keys to get them out. Try searching up on the ice ball track. And whenever the SharpClaw are using Life-Force Doors, they are always trying to hide something!

There's lots to do, Fox. You've got to open each temple, go inside and collect the Sun and Moon Stones, then place them down where you put those teeth. If you get too stuck, then talk to the EarthWalkers.

bit.name: MagicCaveDoorClosed
bit.description: controls iron gate and switches in 1st cave

bit.name: MagicCaveDoorRelated028A
bit.description: related to iron gate, unsure of purpose

hint.phrase: Seems that you've got your mind on something or somebody, hey, Fox? The Krazoa Head has emerged for you to release the Spirit. It's at the top of the palace but just down below from where you saw the girl that you're falling in love with!

bit.name: ENV_dayNo
bit.description: Counts from 0 to 27, increasing every morning in-game time. Used for environmental effects.

bit.name: IM_TrickyRelated02C1
bit.description: set when starting tricky landing scene

hint.phrase: Did Tricky find that hidden tunnel in the back of Belina's prison cell? And to cross that cold river you need to aim your Fire Blaster at the roof of the cave. You did all that yet? Now follow the path down and you'll soon reach the bottom of the mine.
That LightFoot you met on the beach has sure caused you some trouble! When the moving bar is displayed, stop it within the green section to activate the CloudRunner's attack.

bit.name: SH_StaffTutorialDone
bit.description: makes button appear, plays "message will only play if..."

hint.phrase: Hey, Fox. Maybe there's a Krazoa Spirit hidden here? You need to talk to the Chief, but there's no way to reach him. Take a look around with Tricky. My scanners are indicating a few holes...
That Scales always leaves others to do his dirty work. You need to smash into the SharpClaw that's holding the SpellStone. Get racing!

bit.name: ITEM_Spirit1_Releasing
bit.note: Setting this immediately starts the sequence.

bit.name: ITEM_Key336_Got
bit.description: XXX where is this key from?

bit.name: KrazTest1Related0372
bit.description: set when entering Krazoa test 1, cave beside WarpStone

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated0378
bit.description: set when approaching SharpClaws in hut, cleared after race

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated0379
bit.description: set to 0x19 when finishing race even though max is 1 - in kiosk, related to demo mode - map 0x19 is newicemount3

hint.phrase: Hey, Fox! Don't let them get away! Try ramming their bikes to stop them, though all you really need to do is reach Tricky before they do. Watch your path and avoid the mines they drop behind. Good Luck!

bit.name: KrazTest1Related0390
bit.description: set when entering Krazoa test 1, cleared when talking to WarpStone
set when entering cave beside WarpStone

bit.name: IM_WaterRelated03A0
bit.description: set when getting out of water

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated03A2
bit.description: set when gaining control of bike, cleared at end

bit.name: SH_NeedStaffTutorial
bit.description: set when first getting staff, cleared after fight

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated03B9
bit.description: set when approaching SharpClaws in hut, cleared after race

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated03BA
bit.description: set at some point during race

hint.phrase: Fox, you must capture the cannon. Maybe Tricky with his new Flame Command can help?

bit.name: DIM_TriggerLostInBlizzard
bit.description: Trigger scene where Fox walks off into blizzard and comes back

bit.name: DIM_LostInBlizzard
bit.description: Triggered by 0x3E2, actually starts the scene

bit.name: ITEM_NWFood_Got
bit.description: Alpine Root while riding SnowHorn through blizzard; collecting one sets this to 1, then 0

bit.name: SH_QueenRelated03EA
bit.description: set when entering queen cave + when Krystal talks during staff tutorial

hint.phrase: That big HighTop Dinosaur looks a bit upset. Have you tried talking to him? And the scanners are showing markings on the beach. Why don't you use Tricky to check them out?

bit.name: ITEM_TrickyBall_Usable
bit.description: set after throwing and you can throw multiple balls!

bit.name: WorldMapDarkIce
bit.description: unlocked DarkIce Mines on world map

hint.phrase: The GateKeeper has opened the vortex to DarkIce Mines but the Arwing needs extra fuel. Search high and low in the areas you've already visited, and I'm sure I noticed these in the Store...

bit.name: WorldMapCloudFort
bit.description: unlocked CloudRunner Fortress on world map

hint.phrase: The GateKeeper has opened the vortex to CloudRunner Fortress, but the Arwing needs extra fuel. Search high and low in the areas you've already visited. And don't forget to use your PDA's Fuel Scanner if you can't find them.

bit.name: WorldMapWallCity
bit.description: unlocked Walled City on world map

hint.phrase: Did you get the Portal Device from in the Magic Cave? And the ThornTail said to return to the Queen. Maybe she knows the whereabouts of the next SpellStone? And don't forget the Fuel Cells!

bit.name: WorldMapDragRock
bit.description: unlocked Dragon Rock on world map

hint.phrase: Hiya, Fox. One of the ThornTails has always been too busy to talk. He always just mumbled. Maybe you should try speaking to him again? And don't forget about collecting Fuel Cells. You can always get them from the Store if you don't want to search around.

bit.name: SH_ObjGroups
bit.description: also LinkG 0x00: bloops 0x06: switch to open Queen cave?

hint.phrase: This one's easy, Fox! Dodge the barrels and use the Moon Pass key when you get to the top.
With the babies back with their mother, the Treasure Rooms have become open. Inside these rooms there is a hidden path to the Gold Mine. I wonder if that's where the SpellStone is hidden?

bit.name: WM_KrazSpirit1Returning
bit.description: set when the spirit is visible

bit.name: TrickyTalk
bit.description: if < FF, can talk to Tricky, but he won't say anything

hint.phrase: Search around this chamber for a SpellStone Release Point.
Head upwards, Fox. It's a lot harder this time. Keep the Ice Blast close at hand. And you might need to use your Fire Blaster again.
You need to get Tricky back to his mother at ThornTail Hollow. Follow the path, Fox!
C'mon, Fox, you just need to explore and take a good look around. Did you notice the high ledges above you? I think there's a Magic Cave nearby, so keep a close watch on your Staff.
Search around this chamber for a SpellStone Release Point.
C'mon, Fox, you've got the final SpellStone, so hurry up and place it! This side of the temple is very similar to the other side. It's all things you've done before. Just keep your eyes open!

bit.name: ITEM_DeletedSpell5FC_Got
bit.description: in spell bits table but does nothing

hint.phrase: You've got to get the CloudRunner out of the cage. Try getting a Fuel Barrel to the level above. Sensors are showing some sort of mechanism that will move the cage. And don't forget to keep an eye on Tricky. I've got a feeling you'll need to use him here...
You heard the Chief. You need to complete the Tests, and he'll show you what's under the big mound. Just talk to him and he'll give you the option to try them. Get going, Fox!

Go inside the lower level of the huge building and find a way to release the laser ropes and get the HighTop free. Then it's a protection mission, Fox. Make sure the missiles do not hit him as you travel across the land.
You've done this before. Your memory's real bad, Fox! Place the SpellStone and get out of there!

bit.name: SH_Landed064B
bit.description: set when Fox first steps foot on the planet; cleared after Pepper scene

bit.name: ITEM_DeletedSpell777_Got
bit.description: in spell bits table but does nothing

hint.phrase: You've done this before, Fox. Use the SpellStone to get inside and make your way back to the lower levels.
Don't be daunted by the size of this place, Fox. Just look around for pads on the floor and give them a hit with your Ground Quake. All will then be revealed.
You don't take much notice, do you, Fox? By lighting the beacons, you opened a doorway near the Temple. Take a look inside. Tricky will be very happy!
Go and talk to the King EarthWalker, Fox. There are lots of places within this area that you haven't found yet. The map indicates two large temples across the bridges.
Now you've got the Super Ground Quake, you'll be able to knock those RedEye down. And did I mention you need to talk to the Soldier EarthWalkers? They've been hiding things in the big trees...
You might think he's too big to defeat, but bring him down to size with an electric charge. Try standing on those floor pads. Then give him a headache with a loud explosive bang!
...Can you...read me, Fox? The sensors ca...just make...out that...Fr..t is..eak spot. Did you...get that?

Have you seen the Kalda Chom in the crater? That new upgrade you've collected could be used to defeat it. I think you better use it and see what happens... When you get something from the baddie, you need to plant it and use Tricky!

Search around until you get to a large clearing. You'll need MoonSeeds and Bomb Spores to help you! When you get there, you'll find some small gas holes that seem linked to the larger gas hole beneath the Meteor. Try plugging the holes with anything you can find lying around.

bit.name: ITEM_Unknown8A0_Got
bit.description: Hint text is "Released Third Krazoa Spirit"

hint.phrase: Howdy, Fox! This is a big palace so you'll need to explore all the different levels. I think using the SharpClaw Disguise will be the key to finding where you release the Spirit.

bit.name: WM_SwitchCamActive
bit.description: camera pointing at door opened by pressure switch

bit.name: SawMagic
bit.description: Have collected a Staff Energy Gem (if 0, explain it when you collect one)

bit.name: SawWarpPad
bit.description: if not, explains what it is when touching one

bit.name: ITEM_WMGoldKey_Got
bit.description: opens door to barrel at start as Krystal; collecting this also enables C menu

bit.name: MC_IsExiting
bit.description: set to respawn from cave entrance

bit.name: LearnedToSpeak
bit.description: Told how to speak to NPCs

bit.name: CF_EscapedDungeon
bit.description: Exploded dungeon ceiling to be able to get disguise

hint.phrase: Hey, Fox. I can send you a Disguise to fool the guards, but the prison walls are causing too much interference for a successful teleport. Perhaps what is needed is an explosive touch to crack the problem. Use the Disguise to get your Staff back and escape the dungeon.

The Queen gave you the Flute, as this will calm her children. You need to hurry as time is running out. If they get too scared, they're going to leave and then you'll never find them! Once you've found them all, return to the Queen.
You need to find something to reach those high ledges. Maybe there's a Magic Cave hidden in the underground caverns? Remember, the Staff will tell you when a cave is nearby.

bit.name: ITEM_Spell0961_Disabled
bit.description: set when Krystal loses staff, cleared when Fox finds it

bit.name: ITEM_Spell0965_Disabled
bit.description: set when Krystal loses staff, cleared when Fox finds it

bit.name: CF_DoStandUpAnim
bit.description: triggers a falling and getting back up scene on map reload

hint.phrase: You've placed the SpellStone, so head back to Moon Mountain Pass.

bit.name: WM_DinoToldKrystalAboutKrazoa
bit.description: hint is "Learned of Krazoa Tests"; setting replaces his dialogue with "press X to roll"

bit.name: ArwingLeveDone
bit.description: set to instantly finish level (and then crash the game)

bit.name: DR_FlewTo
bit.description: cleared when Arwing flies to Dragon Rock

hint.phrase: This is going to be really dangerous, Fox! Ride the CloudRunner and shoot out the tall pillars. And make sure you protect him. He once helped Krystal, you know.
The SnowHorn can help you, but he's weak from the attack, so you'll need to feed him. Remember, they love to eat Alpine Roots. I'm sure that once he's healthy, he'll give you a lift.
Look around near the WarpStone for a ThornTail in distress. The map shows that there is a large cave within the WarpStone area full of some scary, little egg stealers!
C'mon, Fox! You've done this once already! Use the SpellStone to unlock the bridge and make your way inside the temple.

bit.name: WM_DestroyedWall1
bit.description: cracked wall to inside as Krystal

bit.name: WorldMapDinoPlanet
bit.description: unlocked Dinosaur Planet on world map (automatically set when loading the world map)

bit.name: EnableCMenu
bit.description: set when collecting key on ship

bit.name: WMRelated0A7F
bit.description: related to music? toggled constantly in KP

bit.name: SawLifeDoorExplanation
bit.description: explanation of "kill enemes to open door" - also set when you go through first one

bit.name: WarpStoneUnlockedCC
bit.description: Unused feature where WarpStone would send you to more places. Setting these bits enables an invisble destination menu, but it only crashes the game.

bit.name: WM_Unk0AC8
bit.description: set on first visit to Krazoa Palace

hint.phrase: Keep fighting and you'll get there in the end! This is a good time to master those combo, rolling and defend techniques. And the Ice Blast could be very effective...
It's time to search for a Magic Cave again, Fox. Look out for something that can be burned, as this will reveal a path to a higher place. Remember, your Staff will tell you when you are close.

bit.name: ITEM_Viewfinder_Got
bit.description: aka High-Defnition Display Device or Zoom Goggles

hint.phrase: Hey, Fox. Have you bought the Hi-Def Display Device from the Store yet? I wouldn't go to Walled City without them...
Pit your strength against the SharpClaw. You can do it, Fox! Try letting him get a little head start against you and you may find it's easier to beat him...
You're back at the palace again, Fox! I hope Krystal is still OK? If you're gonna save her, you need to check all levels around the central chamber for a place to use your Portal Device.
It's always good manners to give gifts, Fox. I'm sure that WarpStone fella would be very happy if you gave him something. Why don't you look around in the Store for something you can afford?
This one is easy, Fox. Each of the items comes from one of the places in the windows. Just match the item with the place and you'll get the Spirit!

bit.name: LINKE_TunnelOpen
bit.description: broke open wind tunnel in LinkE

hint.phrase: Sorry, Fox, but you'll have to leave Tricky with his father. You need to finish this alone.

bit.name: IM_BombPlanted
bit.description: in front of cheat well cave

hint.phrase: Looks like you're stuck here, Fox. The warp back has been closed. Go back down inside the palace and find a place where you could not cross before.
This is it, Fox! You've got the final Spirit, so go and release it!

bit.description: related to transporter; set to -1 when stepping on one for first time; toggled constantly in Krazoa Test 1; checked in CRFort

bit.name: SH_ThornTailRelated0CD5
bit.description: probably "talked to guy who tells you to get a lantern"

hint.phrase: The key that the Queen EarthWalker gave you must open a gate somewhere on SnowHorn Wastes. If you find a place to use that, then check around for Garunda Te. My sensors are picking up something hidden underneath ice...

bit.name: SHOP_Unk0CEF
bit.description: set when entering shop, cleared when leaving

hint.phrase: White GrubTub can only be found deep underground. You need to find six. Use Tricky to check out the huge stone well that you walked past when you first arrived from SnowHorn Wastes.

bit.name: NW_Key_Got
bit.description: XXX which? hint is "Saved Queen EarthWalker"

hint.phrase: You've got the GrubTub. Have you forgotten who needs them!? Take them back to the Queen, Fox!

bit.name: SawStaffBoostPad
bit.description: StaffActivated checks for this (hardcoded) in some case relating to sequences

hint.phrase: You must remember what you did at the Volcano... Find where you can show the SpellStone and you'll open the doorway into the temple.
It's time to show off that SpellStone again!

The SpellStone cannot be placed in the upper chamber. Sensors are showing a huge area deep underneath you. It also shows there are three switches waiting for your Staff. It's time to get your fur wet, Fox!

bit.name: CFRelated0D73
bit.description: Cleared when Arwing flies to CR Fort

hint.phrase: You need to get through the mountains back to ThornTail Hollow. But, to get past the BribeClaw, you'll need to fill his pockets with Scarabs! There should be plenty of them around, hidden under rocks.
The Life-Force Door displays 2 Baddies. Find and defeat them to open the route forward. It must be those two that tried to get you with the barrels.

bit.name: ITEM_CheatToken8_Got
bit.description: No corresponding UsedCheatToken8? doesn't show up in C menu

bit.name: CreditsRelated0DF6
bit.description: Set on title screen when showing credits (maybe "should run credits"?)

bit.name: WC_MagicCaveRelated0E05
bit.description: cleared when Arwing flies to Walled City

hint.phrase: You need to open a different route this time, Fox. Make your way into the main chamber and show the SpellStone to unlock the second door.

To get started in this area, Fox, you need to free the EarthWalker. My sensors are showing you need to search in the upper levels of that huge building in which the HighTop is trapped. Start there and see where it takes you.
Now that you've deactivated the Robot's shields, what are you waiting for, Fox? You need to take them down with your Fire Blaster!

bit.name: WM_KrystalRelated0E49
bit.description: set when she looks around in the crystal

hint.phrase: Tricky said you need to collect 6 White GrubTub. They are all hidden underground, so don't stop searching until you've got them all. Don't forget you may need to use your FireFly Lantern.

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated0E6A
bit.description: set when gaining control of bike

bit.name: IM_BikeRelated0E6B
bit.description: set when gaining control of bike

hint.phrase: Hurry up, Fox! You must return to the WarpStone and take the Spirit back to Krazoa Palace. I wonder if that girl will be there?
Looking good, Fox! Sensors are showing that there's a Krazoa Shrine warp nearby. Keep collecting and using the MoonSeeds and they'll lead you straight to it.

bit.name: DRArwingRelated0E7B
bit.description: cleared when Arwing flies to Dragon Rock

hint.phrase: Ride around on the EarthWalker and search the level for the hidden generators. Look closely at cracks in the wall. When you find one, use the EarthWalker's great strength to take it out!
Go to the top of the main temple, Fox. Sensors show there is a Krazoa Shrine Warp Pad at the top!
Quick, Fox! The last shrine was here all along! Make your way back to the top of the palace and go and get the final Spirit!
I think that furry SnowHorn might know how to get out from here. And keep a close eye on Tricky, as he'll show you when his commands can be used. He's sure happy when he's digging holes...
Show off your new SpellStone to open the gate. To get inside the temple, look to the orbs. Maybe the flames can change the color of your Fire Blaster?

The SpellStone unlocked the only route forward. Did you go up the Lift? What about those flames you need to put out? You got past the SharpClaw? Jumped the lava? Used Tricky's Flame again? If you've done this lot, then according to my sensors, you're there!

There's only one path to follow, Fox, and maybe some water levels that can be changed. When you get to a room with four statues, try shooting the targets below them. You'll then reach a block that has to be blasted through a maze. That will lead you to the SpellStone warp pad!

bit.name: SH_Related0EDE
bit.description: Triggers a communication after pushing switch at bottom of well

bit.name: ECSH_InShrine
bit.description: set when entering Krazoa test 1, cleared when leaving

bit.name: WarpRelated0EFB
bit.description: related to warp pads/magic cave; maybe override destination with MagicCaveExitWarp?

hint.phrase: The Krazoa Shrine lies within the mound. To find it, you must first reveal the snake that hides in the mound. After this, don't forget to enter the Shrine!

Before accepting the Blue SnowHorn's Challenge, you may want to explore the whole area as his time limit is tough! Don't forget to blow the Dinosaur Horn when you stand on a pad. This will then show you where the next one is located. After all this, don't forget the Krazoa Shrine!

bit.name: TitleScreenRelated0F15
bit.description: set at some point on file select

bit.name: ArwingRelated0F16
bit.description: set in 1st Arwing level - if cleared, immediately sets again
should be UsedCheatToken8, but that doesn't exist?

bit.name: SH_ToldGetViewFinder
bit.description: Set when arriving after getting 4th stone; triggers a communication if you don't have viewfinder
